def visit(arr, i, visited):
    ans=[]
    temp=arr[i]
    ans.append(i)
    visited[i]=1
    
    if(temp==arr[temp]):
        ans.append(temp)
        return ans
        
    while(temp!=arr[temp]):
        ans.append(temp)
        
        if(visited[i]==1 and temp==i):
            break
        visited[temp]=1
        
        temp=arr[temp]
        
    return ans

n=int(input())
arr=[0]
arr1=list(map(int, input().split()))
for i in arr1:
    arr.append(i)

visited=[0]*(n+1)
x=[]

for i in range(1, n+1):
    if(visited[i]==0):
        x.append(visit(arr, i, visited))
        
print(len(x))
for i in x:
    print(*i)
